thread.title: Wolfpack invited to face SC in 2017 kickoff game in Charlotte
thread.title_full: Wolfpack invited to face SC in 2017 kickoff game in Charlotte

title: Wolfpack invited to face SC in 2017 kickoff game in Charlotte
text:
Wolfpack invited to face SC in 2017 kickoff game in Charlotte 
Posted 1:13 p.m. today   27 Images 
Charlotte, N.C. â€” N.C. State and the University of South Carolina will face off in the 2017 Belk College Kickoff Game at Bank of America Stadium in Charlotte. The date and time of the game, along with complete ticket information, will be announced at a later date. 
"We have many players and fans from that area of the state and we expect to see Bank of America Stadium filled with Wolfpack red," head football coach Dave Doeren said. 
"Wolfpackers will look forward with great anticipation to this ACC-SEC matchup," added Debbie Yow, NC State's director of athletics. 
The two programs have met 57 times since 1900, and the Gamecocks hold a one-game advantage at 27-26-4. N.C. State has played in Bank of America Stadium on six occasions, most recently in the 2011 Belk Bowl, a 31-24 victory over Louisville.
